chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) (net : network) (a b : Net.output), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> inputs_m tr = [Put "james" "awesome"; Get "james"] -> outputs_m tr = [a; b] -> outputs_m tr = [Response "james" (Some "awesome") None; Response "james" (Some "awesome") (Some "awesome")]

Premises:
Module Net := Struct Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Definition data : BaseParams -> Type. Definition input : BaseParams -> Type. Definition output : BaseParams -> Type. Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Definition init : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> data. Definition handler : forall P : BaseParams, OneNodeParams P -> input -> data -> output * data. Record SingleParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_SingleParams { init_handler : data; input_handler : input -> data -> list output * data } Definition init_handler : forall P : BaseParams, Single
step_async_star = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => refl_trans_1n_trace step_async : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), step_relation network (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) Arguments step_async_star {P params}
Inductive name : Set := Primary : name | Backup : name
Inductive output : Set := Response : key -> option value -> option value -> output
step_async_init = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) => {| nwPackets := []; nwState := init_handlers |} : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network Arguments step_async_init {P params}
outputs_m = fun base_params : BaseParams => fix outputs_m (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) : list Net.output := match tr with | [] => [] | (Primary, inr l) :: tr' => (filterMap (fun x : PB_output => match x with | RequestResponse _ os => Some os | ReadResponse _ => None end) l ++ outputs_m tr')%list | (Primary, inl _) :: tr' | (Backup, _) :: tr' => outputs_m tr' end : forall base_params : BaseParams, list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> list Net.output Arguments outputs_m {base_params} _%list_scope
Inductive input : Set := Put : key -> value -> input | Get : key -> input | Del : key -> input | CAS : key -> option value -> value -> input | CAD : key -> value -> input
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
inputs_m = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) => filterMap (fun x : name * (PB_input + list Net.output) => let (y, y0) := x in match y with | Primary => match y0 with | inl (Request i) => Some i | _ => None end | Backup => None end) tr : forall base_params : BaseParams, list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) -> list Net.input Arguments inputs_m {base_params} _%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> Net.data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
revert_trace_eg : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) (o : Net.output), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> inputs_m tr = [Put "james" "awesome"] -> outputs_m tr = [o] -> o = Response "james" (Some "awesome") None
LinearTimeVarD.trace_correct_eg0 = eq_ind ([] ++ [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)])%list LinearTimeVarD.trace_correct (LinearTimeVarD.TCApp [] (Put "james" "awesome") (Some "awesome") None LinearTimeVarD.TCnil eq_refl) [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)] (app_nil_l [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)]) : LinearTimeVarD.trace_correct [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)]
LogTimeVarD.trace_correct_eg0 = eq_ind ([] ++ [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)])%list LogTimeVarD.trace_correct (LogTimeVarD.TCApp [] (Put "james" "awesome") (Some "awesome") None LogTimeVarD.TCnil eq_refl) [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)] (app_nil_l [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)]) : LogTimeVarD.trace_correct [(Put "james" "awesome", Response "james" (Some "awesome") None)]
step_async_outputs_m : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr -> inputs_m tr = [] /\ outputs_m tr = [] /\ nwState net Primary = nwState net' Primary \/ inputs_m tr = [] /\ (exists os : Net.output, outputs_m tr = [os]) \/ (exists i : Net.input, inputs_m tr = [i])
inputs_1_m_revert : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> inputs_m tr = (inputs_1 (revert_trace tr) ++ queue (nwState net Primary))%list
pbj_0_or_1 : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace tr
pbj_NOABT : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> no_output_at_backup_trace tr
lifting_applied : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> trace_correct (revert_trace tr)
transformer : forall P : list (Net.input * Net.output) -> Prop, (forall (st : Net.data) (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)), step_1_star init st tr -> P tr) -> forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> P (revert_trace tr)
simulation : forall (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr -> step_1_star init (revert_state net) (revert_trace tr)
outputs_m_revert_trace : forall tr : list (name * (Net.input + list PB_output)), no_output_at_backup_trace tr -> outputs_m tr = outputs_1 (revert_trace tr)
inputs_m_app_inr_singleton : forall (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) (h : name) (l : list Net.output), inputs_m (tr ++ [(h, inr l)]) = inputs_m tr
network_invariant_inductive : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr -> network_invariant net -> network_invariant net'
inputs_1_nil_is_nil : forall tr : list (Net.input * Net.output), inputs_1 tr = [] -> tr = []
inductive_simulation : forall (net net' : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr -> step_1_star (revert_state net) (revert_state net') (revert_trace tr)
step_1_star_no_trace_no_step : forall (st st' : Net.data) (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)), step_1_star st st' tr -> tr = [] -> st = st'
correspond_reachable : forall (net : network) (tr_m : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async_star step_async_init net tr_m -> forall (st : Net.data) (tr_1 : list (Net.input * Net.output)), step_1_star init st tr_1 -> inputs_1 tr_1 = inputs_m tr_m -> correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m
inputs_1_invert_app : forall (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)) (tr' : list Net.input) (x : Net.input), inputs_1 tr = (tr' ++ [x])%list -> exists (y : list (Net.input * Net.output)) (z : Net.input * Net.output), tr = (y ++ [z])%list /\ inputs_1 y = tr' /\ inputs_1 [z] = [x]
inputs_m_inr : forall (h : name) (t : list Net.output) (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), inputs_m ((h, inr t) :: tr) = inputs_m tr
inputs_m_on_cons : forall (t : name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) (tr : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), inputs_m (t :: tr) = (let (n, s) := t in match n with | Primary => match s with | inl (Request i) => i :: inputs_m tr | _ => inputs_m tr end | Backup => inputs_m tr end)
outputs_1 = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)) => map snd tr : forall base_params : BaseParams, list (Net.input * Net.output) -> list Net.output Arguments outputs_1 {base_params} _%list_scope
inputs_1 = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)) => map fst tr : forall base_params : BaseParams, list (Net.input * Net.output) -> list Net.input Arguments inputs_1 {base_params} _%list_scope
correspond_inductive : forall (net net' : network) (tr_m' : list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output))), step_async net net' tr_m' -> forall (st st' : Net.data) (tr_m : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) (tr_1 tr_1' : list (Net.input * Net.output)), correspond st (nwState net) tr_1 tr_m -> step_1_star st st' tr_1' -> inputs_1 tr_1' = inputs_m tr_m' -> correspond st' (nwState net') (tr_1 ++ tr_1') (tr_m ++ tr_m')
no_output_at_backup_trace = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (A : Type) (tr : list (name * (A + list PB_output))) => forall x : name * (A + list PB_output), In x tr -> no_output_at_backup x : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (A : Type), list (name * (A + list PB_output)) -> Prop Arguments no_output_at_backup_trace {base_params} {A}%type_scope _%list_scope
step_1_snoc_inv : forall (st st' : Net.data) (tr : list (Net.input * Net.output)) (t : Net.input * Net.output), step_1_star st st' (tr ++ [t])%list -> exists st2 : Net.data, step_1_star st st2 tr /\ step_1 st2 st' [t]
zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace = fun (A B C : Type) (tr : list (A * (B + list C))) => forall x : A * (B + list C), In x tr -> zero_or_one_outputs_per_step x : forall A B C : Type, list (A * (B + list C)) -> Prop Arguments zero_or_one_outputs_per_step_trace {A B C}%type_scope _%list_scope
LogTimeVarD.operate = fun (op : input) (curr : option value) => match op with | Put _ v => (Some v, curr) | Get _ => (curr, curr) | Del _ => (None, curr) | CAS _ v v' => if LogTimeVarD.val_eq_dec curr v then (Some v', curr) else (curr, curr) | CAD _ v => if LogTimeVarD.val_eq_dec curr (Some v) then (None, curr) else (curr, curr) end : input -> option value -> option value * option value
correspond_preserved_primary_apply_entry : forall (sigma : name -> Net.data) (sigma' : name -> PB_data) (st : Net.data) (tr_1 : list (Net.input * Net.output)) (tr_m tr_m' : list (name * (Net.input + list Net.output))) (i : Net.input) (l : Net.output) (d : PB_data) (h : name), correspond st sigma tr_1 tr_m -> handler i (state (sigma h)) = (l, state d) -> sigma' Primary = d -> outputs_m tr_m' = [l] -> h = Primary -> queue (sigma h) = i :: queue d -> correspond st sigma' tr_1 (tr_m ++ tr_m')
step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
step_drop_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (Net.input + list Net.output)) ->...-> P n n0 l where ?P : [ |- BaseParams] ?params : [ |- MultiParams ?P]
